file_content.text: Ilosov--we're at the Giant's Spear. What have you got for us?
The ark construction site's behind a triple-plated durasteel blast door. Takes three separate keycards to open the thing. Only Cartel representatives carry them.
Heh, guess the Hutts only trust the Regulators up to a point. You need to find the Cartel's top lieutenants and get their keycards.
Thanks for the intel and advice. We'll contact you again when we unlock that blast door.
Get Cartel keycards--check.
I'll keep searching the files in case there's anything else. Good luck.
Is there a faster way?
Would it be possible to simply cut through the door with, say, a lightsaber?
Would it be faster to blast the door down? If I don't have the firepower, I'm sure somebody here does.
You'd be at it for days. One thing Hutts know how to make is strong doors.
Hutt lackeys don't deserve to live--and I'm feeling especially vindictive today.
There won't be any survivors.
Contact me when you've unlocked the blast door. I'll let you know if we find anything else in these files. Good luck.
We sent probe droids to scan the zone ahead of you. Their readings... not good news.
Regulator fireteams are patrolling the site. Some of Vice Commandant Grevin's finest, backed by top lieutenants from the Hutt Cartel. Everyone's packing military hardware.
You're the expert on Regulator tactics. How do we get through your old friends?
Let's get tactical.
The fireteams are spread out for patrol sweeps. Take those teams out fast enough, and you shouldn't have to worry about a coordinated defense.
Any chance Grevin is commanding these forces? It'd be nice to have another talk with him.
Is the Regulator leader here?
Doesn't look like it. Too bad--that son of a Hutt deserves to fry with the rest of his two-faced traitors.
Let them pack all the hardware they want. Won't be the first army we've wiped out.
We're ready for anything.
Fair enough, but that's not all.
Happy hunting.
